content: I just broke the flatpak build. Have working builds on basically the same setup, the error is unrelated. However, looking more inte this a better solution is required for the "official" flatpak build anyway. I'm on it.

Hi all. I have just updated master after a while and end up with a build issue. LINK : fatal error LNK1181: cannot open input file 'C:\gitprojects\github\OpenCPN\cache\buildwxWidgets\lib\vc_dll\wxmsw
32u_gl.lib'
I have wiped the cache folder, running as admin etc.
On win11, vs2022 rev.17.13.4
Windows is not my cup of tea. That said, nest would be to clear you build folder so you can run cmake again from scratch. Just removing CMakeCache.txt sometimes makes the trick.
Deleting the build folder did the trick, thank you very much. I have no idea what corrupted it in the first place though.
I've had similar problems on macos, and there too deleting the build problem fixed things. That's my first step nowadays when trying to resolve wierd build problems.

Legacy MacOS builds are currently broken, hopefully a transient error in the Homebrew infrastructure. Logs has:

==> Fetching /opt/homebrew/Library/Taps/homebrew/homebrew-cask-versions...
ERROR: Repository not found.
fatal: Could not read from remote repository.

Please make sure you have the correct access rights
and the repository exists.
ERROR: Repository not found.
fatal: Could not read from remote repository.

Please make sure you have the correct access rights
and the repository exists.
